projects.title: IEA- Technical collaboration platform -task 42 Underground hydrogen storage
projects.description: In 2022 the Hydrogen Technology Collaboration Program approved to start up a new international task, known as TCP-Task 42, on storage of hydrogen in underground geological formations (UHS). Currently 54 participants from industry, universities, research organizations and governmental background have joined forces to seek synergies and opportunities for researching the main technical and economic challenges of UHS, which will help to advance towards demonstration in a full operational environment and to establish expertise and guidelines for all stakeholders involved.
